content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3 cups all-purpose flour" )
( ing-1 "1 teaspoon baking soda" )
( ing-2 "1 teaspoon ground cinnamon" )
( ing-3 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-4 "3 apples - peeled, cored and sliced" )
( ing-5 "1 cup white sugar" )
( ing-6 "1 cup brown sugar" )
( ing-7 "1 1/4 cups vegetable oil" )
( ing-8 "2 eggs" )
( ing-9 "2 teaspoons vanilla extract" )
( ing-10 "1 cup chopped walnuts" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan.
2) Sift together the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Sift"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the flour"@17:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "baking soda"@28:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "cinnamon"@41:49 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@54:58 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Combine the apples and the white sugar; set aside.
4) In a large bowl, mix together the brown sugar, oil, eggs and vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the brown sugar"@33:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "oil"@50:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "eggs"@55:59 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "vanilla"@64:71 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Stir in the apple mixture, then the flour mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "the apple mixture"@11:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the flour mixture"@35:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-8-0 "the preheated oven"@11:29 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "45 minutes"@34:44 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean"@49:119 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
